TopicTitle: The Streak. 15G+ Turns. Mach 2.3 at Sea Level.

Articles.Content:
This is the Streak; its a small, one seater plane that will go as fast as you want it to. I've tried to push its boundaries, but the only boundary I've found so far is overheating. However if you feel so inclined, you can switch of heating and get up to 1200m/s (Mach 3.5) at 1km. 

Despite it's entire design being based solely on speed, this plane doesn't sacrifice agility nor aesthetics to achieve its goal. This plane can easily pull off 15G+ turns, and no matter what your speed going this thing will still turn fast without breaking. If you don't mind me saying so, the lines look pretty smooth and the plane has a very polished look. Even the top airbrake blends seamlessly with the rest of the craft.

She's got a lot more lift then you would think; you can glide comfortably below 40m/s without worries. 

If anyone's interested, I'll upload a craft file. For the mean time, enjoy the pictures and take my word for it when I say there is no magic involved.
